item.title: Rethinking Exploration in Reinforcement Learning with Effective Metric-Based Exploration Bonus
item.description: Effective Metric-based Exploration Bonus (EME) enhances reinforcement learning exploration by using a robust metric for state discrepancy and a dynamically adjusted scaling factor based on reward mode…
